documents.document: @JenalaRivera @kreespa @lifeforachild Thank you! 😊
@WilliamJTV Hahahahaha! Nice! 😉 Gnight, Will. Catch up with you on Sunday! Have a good weekend, lovely! Xx
@WilliamJTV Right back atcha, my friend! Fingers crossed all works on Sunday & don't forget to say a prayer to the internet gods beforehand!
@WilliamJTV Lmfao, you could. But that seems like cheating. 😜 😁😁😁
@WilliamJTV Ha, or I could ask you to catch me up, lol. (If I ever actually catch up myself, lol!)
@WilliamJTV Hmmm, yeah, from what I gathered it seemed it was kind of geared to a younger audience with the sitcoms and lighthearted shows.
@WilliamJTV Oh, yes! I forgot they all end up online anyway, cheers, babe!
@WilliamJTV Plus, doesn't help that none of the DC shows are on freetv here, so hard to have to find downloads/streaming etc every week.
@WilliamJTV That said I was never a Flash fan, & Legends was mostly meh for me. Curious about Supergirl though but again, second season now.
@WilliamJTV Yeah, plus the fact I'm too seasons behind on, like, every other DC show doesn't make it too appealing to catch up, y'know?
@WilliamJTV We get lots of ABC Family shows over here, so maybe that'll come over too. Why the weird name change tho, d'ya know?
@WilliamJTV Ooooh, I know ABC Family! Used to adore Melissa & Joey (& still like Baby Daddy!) Will keep an eye out for Beyond over here.
@WilliamJTV Hahaha, yeah, I can imagine! But I'll get my laptop set up for 11.40pm, and will just keep one eye on it while finishing Ellie.
@WilliamJTV So I get super confused by the timeline changes thanks to The Flash etc. (Also 3 eps behind TWD too. Shhhhh! *ducks* 😉)
@WilliamJTV Haha, I will do eventually. I hate the huge amount of crossovers all the time w/Arrow tho coz it's the only DC show I watch.
@WilliamJTV The cast don't seem so cute either, lol.
@WilliamJTV Haha, I've never even heard of that CHANNEL, let alone the show, lol. Will have to imdb it. Yeah, I felt the same re RDale.
@WilliamJTV Obviously, we don't get the ads over here, so I like to watch the US feed for the cool movie spots and fun adverts, lol.
@WilliamJTV Yay! But also boo, coz of the time, lol. Does that include the pre game show? Never watched last year & missd the film trailers.
@WilliamJTV Anyway, I'll stop babbling now. Great to chat to u - let me know about the Superbowl if you're on here before then! Ni night! x
@WilliamJTV I fell behind w/Arrow, like five eps before the holiday hiatus, never caught up, and haven't even touched The 100 yet!
@WilliamJTV You'll have to let me know if it's any good, lol. I'm way behind on SO many shows atm, it's ridick. Never heard of Beyond tho.
@WilliamJTV And not seen Riverdale either - not too impressed by the ads. Seems very TVD-ish, but without the cool supernatural element!
@WilliamJTV Oh good night, my darling! Sorry got distracted. Will you be airing the Superbowl on Sunday? Do you know when it starts?
@WilliamJTV Yeah, my internet must have had a hissy fit. No harm, it was there when I refreshed!
@john_kaser @MattLanter @Twitter Bwahaha, I should've known it was President Cheeto's fault. 😉😁
@MattLanter @Twitter Right?! Thought they'd fixed that! Really enjoying #Timeless btw - the UK just aired the Moon Landing ep yesterday.
@lifeforachild Won £10 on the lottery recently, so perfect opportunity to pay it forward. 😊 Good luck with the campaign!
@lifeforachild Not to worry, Euros work just as well! Thanks for the link, will definitely do my bit for such a underutilised cause!
@WilliamJTV Oh, ffs, the feed just died! Was it on my end or yours?
@WilliamJTV Yeah, it's a colossal pain, lol. But yes, the repeats will definitely help though, thank you! Not a Riverdale fan then, lol?
@lifeforachild And considering the only Valentines card I'm likely to get is a jokey 1 my parents send from her, it's a fitting cause, lol!😁
@lifeforachild My darling dog is diabetic & it's such hard work, I can imagine how difficult it must be for ppl in poor countries.
@lifeforachild Oh, wonderful, thank u! I'm in the UK, so Euros would be closest for me, unless there's a British Sterling equivalent?
@WilliamJTV It'll likely be almost impossible when daylight savings kicks in coz it'd be on at midnight and we'll still be finishing up then
@WilliamJTV We do Ellie's evening meal & insulin at 11pm, which usually takes an hour or so, so it cuts it a bit too fine w/the timeslot.
@WilliamJTV Glad to hear it, it's been a while! Took my hiatus time out for the holidays. Spn's time is a pain coz of Ellie's food/insulin!
Just realised somehow Twitter rudely unfollowed @MattLanter for me. Now too nervous to read his tweets 4 #Timeless spoilers lol! #TimelessUK
@WilliamJTV Hey stranger, happy belated new year! Hope you're good. Can't get used to the early timeslot for Spn, lol.
Really loved tonight's #Supernatural. Not normally one for the angel eps, but truly enjoyed it. @aliciawitty was so badass! #redhairdontcare
@SPN_Sherry @Support Will let you know what I find!
@SPN_Sherry @Support Oh wow, that really is different! I'll give it a looksee on the laptop after Spn, see what I have. Thanks, hon.
@kreespa @lifeforachild Do you know if anyone in the world can donate to this or is it only for US Citizens?
@kreespa @lifeforachild Oh wow, I love this so much! Obv, my diabetic loved one has 4 paws & lots of fur, but still a cause close to my 💜!
@SPN_Sherry @Support That I haven't done. Will give it a go when I'm on my laptop tomorrow. Maybe that's why. What should it look like?
@E4Tweets - loving Spn & @NBCTimeless tonight! @cwthe100 starts in the US tonight too. Any word on when we'll catch up w/Clarke et al here?
@SPN_Sherry @Support And I see this when I click on your actual page. This is via twitter app on an Android tablet,… https://t.co/miAFbIDoQu
@SPN_Sherry @Support Uh... I have this? (Sorry for belated reply!) https://t.co/aX8iSBPkx4
Yes, I totally just followed @Trumpdraws. No, I am absolutely not sorry. https://t.co/7N6x4GCtuc 😂😂😂😂
@TomBLock91 @Support It's so fucking irritating, I can't stand it. Its like that ridiculous Messenger app for fb. F… https://t.co/dkaxUlwB9J
@kreespa Sorry, rant over, lol. I used to love this place, but no one talks to me anymore anyway and now this nonse… https://t.co/9WFAOl5tW5
@kreespa Wouldn't be so bad if I could opt out, but noooo, I just have to put up with it. Every fucking day. Today… https://t.co/2zE0CeAgTQ
@kreespa I know what other ppl are tweeting about - it's called FOLLOWING THEM AND READING THEIR TWEETS! Why do I h… https://t.co/AiYC2DPWtv
@kreespa All I ever get in my 'mentions' is notifications of what other ppl are doing. It's fucking bullshit and there's no way to opt out.
@kreespa Aw, I love you too, kiddo. Sorry, just those stupid new notifications that clog up my 'mentions' that don'… https://t.co/MQKLWKzMCo
@SPN_Sherry @Support What settings do u have that might help? I have a bunch of different settings sections, but th… https://t.co/uNm5YaQw2S
@SPN_Sherry @Support These are the only things available to me regarding what I see on my timeline/notifications. T… https://t.co/zHWPYTq6Td
@SPN_Sherry @Support From other ppl's complaints, there doesn't seem to be a way out of it. It's fucking bullshit &… https://t.co/MCYMygwlaB
@SPN_Sherry @Support Sorry, Sherry, my twitter died last night. Last I checked (& was told) there was no way to opt… https://t.co/jGmPOANrqn
@SPN_Sherry @Support Last I looked, there was no way to stop being inundated with all these bullshit notifications.… https://t.co/C7yrXa4c6M
.@support I AM FOLLOWING PPL ON TWITTER BECAUSE I LIKE TO READ THEIR TWEETS. I DON'T NEED EXTRA NOTIFICATIONS TO DO SO. CREATE AN OPT OUT!!😡
.@Support I'M FED UP TO THE BACK FKING TEETH OF GETTING NOTIFICATIONS ABOUT WHAT MY FRIENDS ARE TWEETING WHEN I CAN READ 4 MYSELF. FIX THIS!
28 notifs since I last posted on @twitter. 2 were for me. Rest were BS RTs/faves/follows from friends. FUCK THIS SHIT (no offence, friends)
Holy fucking shit, #Supernatural, I think my heart just stopped beating. 😦😦😦😦
A couple of days ago, I found out one of my darling robins, who always came to feed in our… https://t.co/HOZRDEyCed
@WWUtilities I'm in Cardiff btw - there used to be a rule that said in built up areas, no construction work cud sta… https://t.co/x8FsMrhQdX
@WWUtilities Sorry for the delayed reply, my battery died. Will DM you now. Sorry about the rant, I'm not at my best on no sleep, lol.
@WWUtilities 13) Oh joy. Now out comes the pneumatic drill. Happy Monday, y'all(!) Seriously, you're taking the piss. Really not happy atm.😬
@WWUtilities 12) so being woken up at 7.30AM by workmen, when I'd literally fallen asleep 5min before? Let's say it's not good for my health
@WWUtilities 11).. what little sleep I can actually get, otherwise my brain goes a bit wonky & also affects me physically. I need my sleep..
@WWUtilities 10) My apologies for the rambling tweets, but I have fibromyalgia (which is a sleep disorder in part) & I desperately need...
@WWUtilities 9) Not to mention, the last time I looked, starting any kind of construction work before 8.30AM is also illegal!
@WWUtilities 8) Like I said, I can deal w/the noise & inconvenience, but starting loud construction work at 7.30 on a Mon morning is not on.
@WWUtilities 7) And now they've started my dog barking w/the yelling & clattering of things being dumped on the road! FFS, it's ridiculous!
@WWUtilities 6) We've put up w/the traffic lights, half a road dug up, the constant noise etc, but working at 7.30AM is unacceptable.
@WWUtilities 5) What could poss be such a life & death situation that demands they have to dig up the road, fill the holes etc at 7.30AM?!
@WWUtilities 4) Not a hope in hell I'll be getting any sleep now, am I? You've already dug up my neighbour's drive… https://t.co/6WzsyP73Bs
@WWUtilities 3) I have been awake all night because of a migraine & just as I think I can grab a few hours sleep; bang, clatter, crash...
@WWUtilities 2) Our road is absolutely chaos w/these gas pipe replacements already. We can deal w/that but starting work at 7.30AM? NOT OK!
Dear @WWUtilities, it's bad enough we've had to deal w/this 4 2 wks, now ur crew thinks it's acceptable to start wo… https://t.co/tuAsyFiet5
Bloody Nora, we got another season. 😯😯😯 #Supernatural #Season13 #SpnFamily https://t.co/bmKfgI2IVZ
"I felt a great disturbance in the Force, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror… https://t.co/FseAw6WFLF
@Channel4 #Christmasin3words - It's my birthday!! Seriously, I'm 29..ish today, lol. (For the 3rd yr in a row. Shh! 😉) Merry Xmas @4Viewers!
@TheLastLeg How can ne1 choose between those contenders for #dickoftheyear? Can we have a quadruple winner? #bunchoftossers #2016suckstoo
@TheLastLeg #Isitok the right wing media is still blaming Angela Merkel & refugees 4 Berlin's tragedy last week #No #Notarefugee #NotaMuslim
@StephanieBally @Support Oh, i dunno if I can promise that. 😜
@StephanieBally @Support Lol, yay! Does that mean you'll post my bail if it backfires? 😉
@StephanieBally @Support Sigh. What utter horseshit. Not like they bother reading shit like this, but they could at least make an opt out.
@StephanieBally @Support *huffs* Well s'one needs to do a fking intervention & throw some meds at it, b4 I punch it in its proverbial dick 😡
@StephanieBally @Support And that's just a screen shot of today's bullshit. It's getting seriously fucking old and I just want it to stop.
@StephanieBally @Support This is what I c in my mentions. Literally 2 items are about/to/for me. The rest are point… https://t.co/wEfnEVtXj6
@StephanieBally @Support But that doesn't make sense! I see them on my normal newsfeed anyway - why the fuck are they in my mentions too? 😔
I'm getting a billion notifications of 'interactions' in my mentions, only to find they're other ppl's likes/faves/RTs & nothing to do w/me!
Ok, can s'one pls explain why I'm getting other ppl's likes, faves & RTs IN MY FUCKING MENTIONS? Is it just me, is it a bug? WTF @Support?!
@rockinstevie Thank you. Happy I-wish-I-could-have-had-a-lie-in Saturday! #Upwaytooearly #Caffeineneeded #Ialreadywantanap 😩😩😩
@AmazonHelp This is my 1st time I've paid for Prime, especially for Xmas & either items simply aren't eligible or won't arrive in time. 😔
@AmazonHelp Each item I saw were 'dispatch within 24hrs' & allegedly eligible for Prime delivery, but I still wudn't be able to get it 2mw.
@AmazonHelp Thanks for the reply. Surely businesses/users who advertise immediate dispatch shouldn't be one of those delayed though?
@ryan_curtis @AmazonHelp Another of the items said 1 day shipping,but would take 3 days. Better, but still not what I needed, or pay for. 😒
@ryan_curtis @AmazonHelp I had this last week. Told me it was covered by Amazon Prime 1 day shipping, but wouldn't turn up till after Xmas!
